steps.title: Decide number of stories and layout concept
Create decision log and change control plan
Select project management tool and file storage
Confirm access for deliveries and cranes
Create communication plan with builder and trades
Confirm delivery schedule for all long-leads
Set up jobsite rules and safety plan
Trench and install electrical service conduit
Trench and install gas line (if needed)
Trench and install water service line
Install drain rock and filter fabric
Install sump pit and pump (if needed)
Install exterior foam board seams taped
Install exterior sewer line to main/septic
Install cleanouts and vents through roof
Install water heater rough location prep
Install fire sprinkler piping rough-in (if combined contractor)
Run wiring for well pump (if applicable)
Run wiring for septic pump (if applicable)
Temporary power to permanent cutover planning
Install conduit for future low-voltage expansion
Install sink faucet holes drilling (if needed)
Install final plumbing fixtures in Kitchen
Install final plumbing fixtures in Primary bath
Install final plumbing fixtures in Guest bath
Install final plumbing fixtures in Powder room
Install final plumbing fixtures in Laundry
Install final plumbing fixtures in Mudroom
Install final lighting in Primary bath
Install final lighting in Guest bath
Install final lighting in Powder room
Install final lighting in Mechanical room
